mapper.select: SELECT station_seq, addr, chargetp, cpid, cpnm, cpstat, cptp, csid, csnm, lat, longi, statupdatetime FROM station_data WHERE station_seq = #{station_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO station_data ( station_seq, addr, chargetp, cpid, cpnm, cpstat, cptp, csid, csnm, lat, longi, statupdatetime ) VALUES ( #{station_seq}, #{addr}, #{chargetp}, #{cpid}, #{cpnm}, #{cpstat}, #{cptp}, #{csid}, #{csnm}, #{lat}, #{longi}, #{statupdatetime} )
